| ------------------- | ------------- |

| Long-Term Retention | {config}      |
| Geo-Redundancy      | {config}      |

**Point-in-Time Restore Command:**

```bash
az sql db restore \
  --resource-group {rg} \
  --server {server} \
  --name {db} \
  --dest-name {db}-restored \
  --time "{timestamp}"
```
